query: <s> why did the team discuss the desired features of the new tv remote controls ?
answer: industrial designer : but but to sell it for twenty five you need a lot of neat features . for sure . user interface : make that might make it a bit different from the rest at least . um , and as you say , we need to have some kind of gimmick , so um i thought maybe something like if you lose it and you can whistle , project manager : okay . the the keyrings , yeah yeah . user interface : you know those things ? because we always lose our remote control . industrial designer : right . marketing : uh yeah uh ,
